PopularCourse.title: CONFLICT RESOLUTION SKILLS
PopularCourse.description: Conflict resolution is the process by which two or more parties engaged in a disagreement, dispute, or debate reach an agreement resolving it.

PopularCourse.title: LATERAL THINKING IN BUSINESS
PopularCourse.description: Lateral thinking is a business strategy that involves approaching a problem from a different direction

PopularCourse.title: CHANGE MANAGEMENT
PopularCourse.description: Change management is a systematic approach to dealing with the transition or transformation of an organization's goals, processes or technologies.

PopularCourse.title: ORGANIZATION BEHAVIOUR
PopularCourse.description: Organizational behavior is the study of how people interact within groups and its principles are used to make businesses operate more effectively.
